title: Interpretation of a dream about buying clothes by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of seeing buying clothes in a dream and seeing buying clothes in a dream indicates a new life and positive changes in a person’s life. The interpretation of the dream is buying clothes in a dream, which are the clothes that protect the human body from external factors, and the process of buying clothes, due to the different shapes and diversity of clothes, Every person is confused between the genders. You wish to have an elegant and attractive appearance and today we will explain to you the vision of buying clothes in a dream, the interpretation of the dream of seeing buying clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of the dream of buying clothes by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin also explained the vision of buying clothes, indicating the beginning of a new life.The vision of buying clothes also indicates On traveling. Seeing clothes in a dream indicates a positive change in the dreamer’s life. Seeing yourself buying piles of clothes indicates the death of a loved one. Seeing yourself buying dirty clothes indicates despair and failure. As for uniforms, it indicates acquired greatness. Seeing yourself buying clean clothes indicates the arrival of goodness. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a seagull in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying clothes for unmarried women. Seeing singles in a dream buying clothes indicates the admiration of their colleague. Single people seeing themselves buying a dress or a shirt in a dream means that marriage will come soon. Interpretation of a dream about old clothes: Seeing old clothes cut off means boycott. Seeing new clothes indicates the arrival of goodness to his family. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a suit in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying clothes for a married woman. Seeing a married woman buying new clothes in a dream indicates renewal of her life. Also, buying clothes for a woman For a married woman, it shows an increase in her beauty. Seeing a married woman buying a coat indicates that she has a great source of income. Seeing a married woman buying a white dress symbolizes a happy life and good luck. Interpretation of a dream about buying clothes for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman buying a new dress indicates the birth of a girl. Seeing a pregnant woman You buy a coat that indicates the birth of a boy. If you see that you are buying clothes for a pregnant woman, this indicates the safety of her and her fetus. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing black clothes in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about providing clothes. Seeing that you are giving clothes as a gift in a dream means that you are hiding flaws. Thus, seeing The gift of new clothes indicates the arrival of abundance of sustenance and goodness. Seeing a deceased gift in a dress for a married woman indicates the approaching pregnancy. Interpretation of dreams of entering a clothing store for single women. Seeing new clothes in one dream is a sign of a new life. A clothing store indicates success and excellence in her academic life. Or the process. Seeing a clothing store selling expensive clothes means prosperity and cover. It also indicates ambition and dreams that the dreamer hopes to achieve. If a girl is seen looking for clothes that suit her and wearing beautiful clothes, this indicates her religion and good morals. It also indicates achieving what she aspires to To him. Also, selling old or worn clothes is not a good thing, and seeing a girl

title: Interpretation of drinking milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of drinking milk in a dream and its meaning in detail. Dreaming about food and drink is one of the dreams that carry certain symbols for the dreamer and are related to some current events in his life, and milk is one of the basic drinks for the growth and nutrition of the human body since childhood. This is because it contains the vitamins and minerals necessary for growth, in addition to its role in Prevention of many diseases, but the most important question remains: Is seeing milk in a dream a praiseworthy dream or a hateful dream for the dreamer? By Ibn Sirin in the interpretation of this dream.Interpretation of drinking milk in a dreamInterpretation of the dream of drinking milk in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing milk in general in a dream symbolizes goodness and abundant livelihood for the dreamer. As for seeing a drink of milk in a dream, it is a sign that the dreamer enjoys good health in Reality. If the dreamer sees that he is eating a lot of milk in a dream, this vision indicates goodness and livelihood for the dreamer as well, and it may indicate that he will reach a prominent position or gain a lot of money. In the case of drinking milk with sugar, it is a vision that indicates success and success in reality. Or it indicates joy and happiness for the pioneer, and this dream also symbolizes abundance of nutrition. But if the dreamer sees himself bathing with milk in a dream, this means that he has good behavior in reality. Drinking hot milk in a dream indicates the competition that the dreamer faces in reality, while drinking Cold milk is an indicator of the stability of his life, whether social or professional. Eating spoiled milk in a dream is an indication of the great responsibility that the dreamer bears in reality, and it is also evidence of the state of loss that the dreamer is suffering from. If the dreamer sees that he is eating milk and distributing it to his relatives, This vision symbolizes his loss in his life. If he drinks impure milk, it is a hateful vision and indicates misery in his life. The vision of drinking milk in a single woman’s dream. As for an unmarried woman, if she dreams that she is drinking milk, this vision indicates the death of worries and concerns and the approaching of the womb. Seeing them drinking milk in a dream for an unmarried woman also means success and prosperity. If an unmarried woman dreams of milk falling on the ground, then this vision is a sign that she is wasting her time on matters that are not beneficial to her. If an unmarried woman dreams of taking milk from someone in a dream, This vision is a sign of sustenance and may indicate that she will obtain money or get married soon, and God knows best. Seeing drinking milk in a dream is for a married woman. As for a married woman, her dream of drinking milk in a dream is evidence of the good behavior she enjoys among people. Among the symbols of seeing yourself Drinking milk in a dream indicates repentance and seeking forgiveness from God. Also, seeing a married woman drinking milk in a dream indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best, and this dream is an indication of the stability of her married life. But if a married woman sees milk falling on the ground, this vision is a sign On her loss of money, and God knows best. In the event that a married woman sees the same

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about medicine according to Ibn Sirin and senior scholars?

preview.html: Interpretations need to see medicine in a dream. Interpreting a dream about medicine is one of the things that many people ask about. Because medicine is actually a cure for many diseases, so when a fortuneteller sees it in a dream, it causes anxiety and he wants to know its interpretation. Seeing medicine in a dream Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing medicine in a dream as a sign of a person gaining useful knowledge. He explains the interpretation of dreaming about medicine and oral medicine in a dream Saladin is the person who sees it. Seeing a person drinking medicine that has a foul taste is interpreted by the dreamer’s illness and the disappearance of this disease. Seeing medicine and drinking a yellow-colored medicine is interpreted by the person who sees the disease in reality. Dreaming of medicine with a bitter taste is interpreted by the dreamer’s need to Money in real life. Scientists interpret that taking medicine in general in a dream causes illness for the dreamer. If a person sees in a dream that he is taking medicine in an easy and pleasant way, this indicates recovery from illness, if the person who sees the dream is suffering from illness in reality. What What is the interpretation of medicine in a single woman’s dream? Scientists have interpreted seeing medicine in a dream for an unmarried girl as her wedding date approaches. Other scholars have interpreted seeing medicine in a single woman’s dream as good luck for her in her next life. Explaining the vision of taking drugs with an unpleasant taste and taste in An unmarried girl’s dream is to face difficulties, problems, and troubles in her next life. Interpretation of a dream about drinking medicine for a single woman: This vision in an unmarried woman’s dream has many meanings. If the medicine in her dream is sweet in taste, then this makes her happy, whether in her romantic relationship, work, social relationships, academic excellence, and the enjoyment of health and medicine. An unpleasant taste is interpreted in contrast to what was previously mentioned.Interpretation of a dream about eating medicinal pillsThere are six positive meanings in the fortuneteller’s dream about pills, and there are also four negative meanings for the same vision, so we will explain each of them separately, first the positive interpretations:If the pills are in a young man’s dream It exudes fragrant scents and its taste is beautiful or at least acceptable, then the dream is a sign of a wife who is acceptable in form and style. If the married man dreams of the same dream that he had previously and he is awake and prays to God to honor him by giving him a son, then the dream predicts the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desire that he He asked his Lord many times. He will give him a useful and confident son, and people will bear witness to the boy’s wisdom and mental balance in the long run. If the dreamer takes the medicine in the vision, this is a sign that he will obtain a vial of ink or the so-called medicine that was used in ancient times to write manuscripts, but in our time the dream will be translated into That the dreamer will get ink pens with which he will write. If a woman sees in a dream the pills that she is taking to prevent pregnancy, this is a sign that she will turn away from something or stop doing something that would have harmed her if she did so. The ignorant of knowledge, if he takes in a dream Medicine pills, seeing them is a sign of erasing his ignorance and preparing him for a new life free of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about crocodile

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing crocodiles in a dream in detail is one of the disturbing things that greatly frightens the visionary. The crocodile is a wild reptile that feeds on meat. You may also see a lion in a dream. It could be bird meat, fish, or even human flesh if it exists. It also lives on land and in the sea. Searching for the whereabouts of food and seeing it in a dream frightens the dreamer, so it is necessary to know the details of seeing a crocodile in a dream accurately. Seeing a large crocodile in a dream indicates a person who commits many sins and needs to repent to God. If one sees a crocodile in his dream and the crocodile is in front of him Exactly. It indicates a person close to him who is hostile and gets him into a big problem. In the event that he sees a small crocodile attacking him, the fortuneteller can kill that crocodile. It indicates that a person has overcome evil and is ready to get closer to God. Read also: Toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing crocodiles in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing crocodiles in a dream. In detail by Ibn Shaheen, seeing crocodiles in a dream can be interpreted according to what Sheikh Al-Nabulsi said as follows. Seeing a crocodile in a dream is evidence of the presence of taboos. Seeing more than one crocodile in a dream indicates the presence of sadness and distress in that place. It is said that it is a financial crisis that the dreamer is exposed to in his life as a result of the loss of money. Seeing a crocodile in a dream represents imminent death. Crocodiles in a dream are hateful dreams in all their shapes, colors and sizes, because they are not pets or predatory animals, and seeing them is a danger threatening the dreamer and his family, and entering the house is evil, evil, grief and grief. . Loss of trade. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing crocodiles in a dream in detail by Ibn Shaheen. Talking about our topic. Interpretation of seeing crocodiles in a dream in detail. It is necessary to know the interpretation of seeing crocodiles in a dream by Ibn Shaheen, so the interpretation is as follows: Seeing a crocodile in a dream by Ibn Shaheen is an enemy without security. As for seeing a crocodile being killed in a dream, it is a sign of victory, triumph, and salvation from evil, deception, deception, and betrayal. Seeing a crocodile killing the dreamer in a dream indicates the dreamer’s death in his life at the hands of a strong enemy. Read also: Penguin in a dream. Interpretation of seeing crocodiles in a dream in detail by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets Sirin Seeing crocodiles in a dream is as follows: Seeing a crocodile in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is evidence of the presence of many enemies and influences. A sleeping crocodile in a dream is a policeman who protects people from the enemy. Seeing a crocodile in a dream is a dangerous person who harms everyone and harms everyone. A crocodile attack in a dream The dreamer has a reprehensible vision that expresses the violent conflict between the dreamer and his enemies. Read more: Interpretation of seeing raw meat served in a dreamInterpretation of seeing crocodiles in a dreamSeeing salvation from crocodiles in a dream indicates certain interpretations and meanings, as the following suggests: Seeing salvation from crocodiles in a dream represents Redemption from the government and the injustice that some may inflict. Seeing a crocodile running in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is running away from the people he wants.

title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Ash-Shu'ara in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of Surat Al-Shu’ara in a dream. Seeing or hearing the words of God in a dream carries with it direct messages from God (Glory be to Him), but not everyone realizes or understands these messages and what it means to see them in a dream or to be tempted by them. To get closer? We explain this in our next article. Surat Al-Shu’ara in a dream. The Holy Qur’an in a dream has multiple meanings that it conveys to the dreamer, which differ according to the verses that the dreamer hears or read, and also differs according to the condition of the dreamer, whether he is a young man or a girl, single, or married. Divorced or pregnant, many scholars have narrated their interpretation of reading or hearing verses from Surat Ash-Shu’ara in a dream, such as: Ibn Sirin said that this is an indication of the dreamer’s morals and his distance from immorality. Imam Al-Sadiq first mentioned this as evidence of the difficulty of the Messenger’s life and his failure to achieve any goal. Nothing except after a lot of trouble, and this is what the friend also mentioned. It is a sign of the infallibility of doing evil, such as lying, bad words, perjury, and doing all of these things. It can indicate the occurrence of problems in the life of the dreamer, whether at work or at home, and most Things in his life are difficult, and this is what Imam Al-Nabulsi mentioned. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Shu’ara’ in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said about the interpretation of hearing or reading Surat Al-Shu’ara’ in a dream that it is from among the human beings of the dreamer that he praises. It declares the infallibility of committing sins and immoralities, and this is confirmed by the rest of the dream interpreters. Surat Al-Shu’ara in a dream for an unmarried woman. A virgin’s vision of Surat Al-Shu’ara in her dream reading or listening to a number of indications mentioned by scholars, such as: If she is not a Muslim, then the vision is evidence of heartbreak and disappointment in the children. The vision may indicate the girl’s good morals, and her abstinence from what displeases God, if she is sincere and loyal. It indicates the presence of some difficulties in the girl’s life. If the girl is far from commitment, this indicates the following desire and bad company. The vision heralds longevity for the girl, And a good ending, and you will be blessed with good offspring. It also indicates guidance, repentance, and recovery if the dreamer is sick. Your dream will be interpreted in seconds on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website by Google. Surat Al-Shu’ara’ in a dream about a pregnant woman. Hearing Surat Al-Shu’ara’ or some of its verses in a pregnant woman’s dream can indicate The state of her birth, meaning that if she is happy and reassured in the vision, then her birth will be easy and smooth if she wants God. A metaphor for the birth of good offspring for boys and girls. It declares the woman’s commitment and closeness to God, who protects her from committing sins. A sign of her recovery after birth and her long life. The 20 most important Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Shu’ara in a dreamInterpretation of hearing Surat Al-Shu’ara in a dream Jaafar Al-Sadiq said in interpreting this vision that it is evidence of some mistakes in the life of the dreamer. Ibn Sirin interprets hearing or reading Surat Al-Shu’ar in a dream as evidence of God’s protection for the pioneer and that he does not commit immorality. He also mentioned that it is a sign To the fortune teller's distance from speaking evil and from lying, breaking oaths, and doing evil. In conclusion, these are the interpretations of science

Ibn Sirin interprets hearing or reading Surat Al-Shu’ar in a dream as evidence of God’s protection for the pioneer and that he does not commit immorality. He also mentioned that it is a sign To the fortune teller's distance from speaking evil and from lying, breaking oaths, and doing evil. In conclusion, these are the interpretations of science

title: Interpretation of a chick in a dream: Seeing a chick in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Dream of chicks and chicks, yellow, white, black, for a girl, for a single woman, pregnant woman, married woman, divorced woman, buy slaughter, eat, hunt, to kill and cook the dead and more by Ibn Sirin’s chick The meaning of a chick in a dream It denotes goodness, happiness, profit and health Clean and halal money. The owner of the vision will be the owner of a wonderful job without putting in much effort, without getting tired, without engaging in hard work, and without worry. And whoever sees a chick in a dream is a person whom people glorify, glorify, and be proud of, and who will be happy, and at the same time announce that he is receiving good news. These appear Vision is a great good. The person with the vision will fulfill the dreams he desires. He will live a happy life, people who feel distress will find comfort, and the sick will find healing. It also indicates reconciliation between opponents. Killing a chick in a dream indicates problems, worries, and corruption that will appear within the family and problems that will pass before you. The problems within the family will not disappear easily. Seeing the death of a chick in a dream indicates that things that you wanted before have escaped and are stuck in your hand, and the person who sees the death of a chick in a dream will lean uselessly and a slope will break, and it also shows lack of luck and unhappiness. Seeing a yellow chick in a dream in this The vision is good and dignity, and the dreamer fulfills what he longs for and has been waiting for for years. It also indicates sustenance and entry into a beautiful emotional relationship. Seeing a chick in a dreamThis vision always comes to a beautiful woman, but it is unreasonable and appears to a woman who always wants to do all the work. Watching chicks being fed indicates times when You will live in it with your family and the person who feeds the chicks will join the gathering with the family or perform an operation. Sometimes this vision indicates that you will receive help from a family member or find charity from him. Love a chick in a dream. The dreamer will experience a beautiful moment, get rid of all problems, and obtain a great blessing. Seeing a chick coming out of the egg in a dream. This vision comes to unmarried people and generally indicates Marriage and that you will have children. Wives. Playing with a chick in a dream. A person playing with a chick in a dream indicates that you will have a child or indicates the time that you will spend with your child. For pregnant women, this vision indicates ease of childbirth. As for singles, it indicates marriage. Roja chick next to chicks, it indicates a woman, a child, or someone very close to you. Seeing a chick chasing a chick indicates harm to your family because of you and harm to those in need. Killing a chick or chick in a dream portends evil, while providing fodder for joy with the chicks shows your helper, to others and that you will take care of the poor and take care of them. Eating a live chick in a dream Eating a live chick in a dream indicates the harm you will cause to others and people’s sorrows, in addition to the results of the movements that You did it, intentionally or unintentionally. Butchering a chick in a dream. Whoever slaughters a chick in a dream will face problems with his family, as it indicates corruption that will appear in relatives.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a boat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a boat in a dream: Seeing a boat trip means comfort, calm, and enjoying good health. It is not recommended to go down to the bottom of the sea as a sign of dangers and problems. Certainly, seeing a boat in a dream indicates many signs and symptoms in our lives. The boat indicates escape from danger, achievement of ambitions and goals, and the collapse of problems and disagreements. We will tell you through the following lines: Interpretation of dreams to see a boat in a dream, follow us. Interpretation of a dream to see a boat in a dream by Al-NabulsiSeeing a boat or boat in a dream is a sign of escaping from adversity and danger. The dreamer who intends to cross the sea road and sees the boat in his dream indicates that This can prevent drowning. It indicates that he has overcome adversity and obstacles. The dream interpretation of a married man about a boat indicates that he has a good wife who can help him and cooperate with him in the responsibilities of life. Seeing a ship that is not moving at sea means material losses. Seeing a boat or a small boat resting after Fatigue and finding solutions to problems. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a boat in a dream for a single woman. Explain that seeing a girl’s boat in a dream can show the strength of her determination in life. Seeing a ship at sea, without knowing where the ship is anchored, proves that she is in a state of loss of life. By seeing her boat calm And calm at sea, her marriage to a strong, generous but strict man was proven. The boat that a woman dreams of indicates travel and the benefits that she will receive. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a boat in a dream for a married womanExplain that seeing a boat or boat in a dream indicates abundant sustenance and abundant goodness in her life. In addition, dreaming about a boat means getting rid of problems and differences in life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a boat in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a boat in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates her survival during pregnancy and ease of childbirth. Seeing a boat in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates many good things after Childbirth and plenty of nutrition. See kayaking to achieve success in school or work. A sick person seeing a rowing boat indicates that he will recover. Other indicators. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a boat in a dream. Dreaming of a ship indicates control of crucial decisions, patience and wisdom. Seeing a boat trip indicates that you are facing problems And disputes. Seeing a ship in a dream indicates the travel of a priest. Seeing a righteous man on a ship indicates obedience and uprightness to God’s commands. A dream about a wooden boat indicates exhaustion and suffering for the pioneer. Seeing a sailboat indicates many benefits and benefits that will accrue to him from serving people. And loyalty to them. A dream about sailing with a dead person indicates the repayment of debts and the death of stress and pain. Seeing a ship at sea indicates wealth after poverty and the fulfillment of desires. Seeing a ship for an unmarried young man indicates the approach of his marriage. Interpretation of a dream about riding a small boat at sea. Seeing a small boat trip at sea indicates To safety and freedom from distress. Seeing walking on the sea portends a lot of goodness for the pioneer and a lot of money. Seeing a short boat trip in...

title: Interpretation of seeing dates in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about dates in a dream in detail: Eating dates is considered a Sunnah for our Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. Eating dates has many benefits, whether for children or adults. Dates are very useful in treating anemia, so doctors always advise pregnant women to eat a lot of dates in the last months of pregnancy, as they help facilitate the birth process, as well as supply the pregnancy with the vitamins and iron that its body needs. A new baby as soon as he is born, as the infant caresses you for a year with the authority of our Prophet Muhammad, but the matter is different when you dream of dates. The interpretation of the dream of seeing dates in a dream has a meaning and the interpretation that we will discuss in our current article according to the great Arab interpreters and scholars. Interpretation of the dream of seeing dates by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin continued. In the interpretation of dates in a dream as a sign of sustenance and money, because it indicates memorization of the Holy Qur’an. Ibn Sirin concluded the interpretation of dates with this in the interpretation of our master Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. When our master Omar, may God be pleased with him, saw that he was eating a sinful act in his sleep, he interpreted this However, it is the choice of the beloved as the sweetness of faith. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is distributing dates to people, the dream indicates that he is spending from his money, and in return for spending he will receive a good reward. As for whoever sees in his dream that a dead person is insulting him, then his dream is worthy of praise. His vision and wishes indicate that the dreamer will have a new opportunity to undertake a unique project that will succeed and reap a lot. Of the profit behind this. Interpretation of the dream of seeing dates according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing the date in a dream is a sign of rain. Seeing him eating dates indicates the food and goodness that the dreamer will obtain. Also, buried dates are evidence of the money that the dreamer has saved. Seeing dates spread on the ground It means losing money. Seeing harvesting dates in their season indicates his marriage to an honorable and kind woman. Seeing that the dreamer has gone ahead and carved them and removed the pits from them is evidence of the birth of a boy. To dream of eating dates means that you will hear kind words. Seeing him eating forty dates at a door The Sultan or the governor has passed the time, and the evidence is that he was beaten with forty lashes. As for seeing the food of forty people passing in front of the ruler’s door, this date at that time indicates that the dreamer had earned forty dirhams. Seeing a married woman eating dates is evidence that she will receive the inheritance from her husband, and this Muharram because she has already separated from him. A man sees his wife picking brown grapes from a palm tree, and the evidence is that she gave birth to a child from a Mamluk. Dating interpretation of dreams for a single woman. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is eating dates, this means that she will marry a man who has wealth, wealth, and honor. As for an unmarried woman A married woman who sees in her dream that she is buying dates, then her dream indicates that she will have terrible luck in a short marriage. Interpretation of a dream about dates for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating dates, then her dream indicates that she is living a happy married life. But if a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating dates, then her dream indicates that she is living a happy married life. If she buys dates, her dream indicates that she will get money

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Vesik in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see fesich in a dream. Seeing fesich in a dream means achieving desires and goals in addition to good luck and hearing good news. Eating fesich can indicate a bad psychological state and can indicate illness. A type of salted fish that many people are accustomed to eating and when we see it in our dreams we do not find the correct interpretation and therefore we will list the most important interpretations related to the dream of seeing fesich in a dream. Follow us. Dream of seeing fesich Ibn Sirin Interpretation of the dream of eating fesich in a dream according to what Ibn Sirin said is desirable. Because it is evidence of hearing good news. The dream of eating fesikh in a dream can indicate many fears and sorrows that the dreamer may face in the coming period. Seeing food in a dream is generally a sign of the dreamer's bad psychological state or the illness that may afflict him. The dream of seeing a fesikh market in a dream is evidence of a major disaster that the dreamer may fall into and change his life for the worse. The interpretation of selling fesikh in a dream indicates solving problems and overcoming crises, obstacles and challenges that the dreamer may face. Dreaming of seeing fesikh for a married woman Interpretation of a dream of fesikh in a married woman's dream is evidence of a lot of goodness and an increase in blessings and blessings in money and children. Seeing buying fesikh in a dream for a married woman indicates many problems. Disagreements with the husband can lead to divorce and separation. Seeing the sale of fesikh in a dream for a married woman indicates the cessation of tension and anxiety. Healing after illness and happiness after sadness and patience. The dream of seeing fesikh for a pregnant woman Seeing it uneaten in a pregnant woman's dream indicates that she will give birth to a male child and will be the source of her happiness after his birth. The dream of cleaning and cutting in a dream Pregnant woman is evidence of an easy natural birth. And check her safety and the safety of her unborn child. Dream of seeing a man's face Dreaming of seeing fesik in a man's dream is evidence of a lot of money and increasing profits if he is a merchant. Seeing the sale of fesik in a dream is a sign of getting rid of debts and paying them and overcoming problems and difficulties. Dream of seeing fesikh for a single woman Seeing yourself eating flatfish means a lot of good in the fortuneteller's life, fulfilling desires, pleasant surprises, and good luck. Fesikh or herring in an unmarried woman's dream indicates bad things in her life and the presence of an evil person in her life who seduces her. Seeing fesik in a dream means a lot of problems and marital strife. Seeing a clear fesik indicates the collapse of anxiety and anxiety. Sardines can indicate evil people and the need to beware of them. Interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman in a dream is a sign and a warning from someone close to her who has an emotional relationship that can cause her a lot of sadness and pain. Dreaming of buying fesikh in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of many problems and conflicts with family and friends and a feeling of failure, despair and disappointment Hope. Seeing salted fish in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence that she has lost someone close to her.
